info.name: Project 02# - Restful Booker - With Requirement
info.description: This API basically about Hotel Booking where we validate Create booking, Get Booking Details (By ID, Name & Dates), Update the booking (Full API), Update partical booking (Firstname and Lastname), Delete Booking.

request.description: Generated from cURL: curl -i https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/ping

Generated from cURL: curl -X POST \
  https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/auth \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "username" : "admin",
    "password" : "password123"
}'

Generated from cURL: curl -X POST \
  https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "firstname" : "Jim",
    "lastname" : "Brown",
    "totalprice" : 111,
    "depositpaid" : true,
    "bookingdates" : {
        "checkin" : "2018-01-01",
        "checkout" : "2019-01-01"
    },
    "additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"
}'
